summary: West Virginia is a state in the U.S. located in the South and Mid-Atlantic regions. It borders several states, including Pennsylvania, Maryland, and Virginia. With a population of around 1.8 million, Charleston is the capital and largest city. West Virginia became a state during the American Civil War, separating from Virginia. It has a history of coal mining and logging, and is known for its beautiful mountains and outdoor activities like skiing and hiking. Politically, it was mostly Democratic for many years, but has recently become a Republican-leaning state.
title: West Virginia
